verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sri rakshakuni namamu keerthinchi kolvudi Kireetamunchi chatudi sri raja, raja, raja rajadhiraja !{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sri yesuni hatha sakshulara me raju eyane Kireetamunchi chatudi sri raja, raja, raja rajadhiraja !{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Narulara me koraku maranambu nondenu Kireetamunchi chatudi sri raja, raja, raja rajadhiraja !{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sarva janangamulara saranyudiyane Kireetamunchi chatudi sri raja, raja, raja rajadhiraja !{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parmbhunandu yesuku gireetamunchuchu Harshambuto geertinchumu sri raja, raja, raja rajadhiraja !{/lang-eng}
